articles.title: Only 7 days left to invest in Senior citizens special fixed deposit (FD) scheme of these lenders - Times Now
articles.description: Recently a lot of lenders have cut bank FD rates which has led to people looking for other investment instruments. In order to lure customers back, top lenders announced special FD schemes for senior citizens.
